name: places/ChIJAbYJUZFZwokRZBShlBLzRZQ
formattedAddress: 141 W 37th St, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 141 W 37th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text:
Kee cut my hair and I love it. He kept it fast,simple, and did a good job. I showed him a picture and told him I wanted it similar ish. He gave me a fade and thinned the top to make it easier to style. Then he took the time to individually style parts of my hair to make the look more unique and slightly messy. It looks way better than when I do it myself ðŸ˜‚

The location is new so it's very clean. They are stay open from 8am - 8pm during the weekdays so it's super convenient to go after work. If you're there ask for Kee.

originalText.text: Great Hair Salon - Nadia was excellent- Grear Blow Dry & we got a walk in appointment - so friendly & a fab new salon with comfy chairs. Highly recommend if you are a tourist in NYC

text.text: Great Hair Salon - Nadia was excellent- Grear Blow Dry & we got a walk in appointment - so friendly & a fab new salon with comfy chairs. Highly recommend if you are a tourist in NYC

originalText.text:
Nadya is the best! If you have any color or styling issues you have to go to her!
After many years of hair struggles, I gave up. My old stylist moved to Miami years ago and itâ€™s been a never ending struggle of bad styles and color that was off. I felt so down about my hair that I let my roots grow out for 4 months and decided to wear my hair in a ponytail. I thought I just needed a trim of my bangs. So I walked in and met Nadya. She made some suggestions and basically I walked out looking and feeling like a model. A few carefully-placed highlights that blended perfectly into the grey hairs sprouting in my crown, a gentle suggestion to grow out the bangs, a trim on the ends, and I look stunning, if I may say so myself! Nadya said she joined this salon after many years with Jean Pierre Hair Salon (which closed recently). I am so glad I trusted her honest and experienced judgment and excellent vision for what my hair could be! Sheâ€™s such a lovely person too, I really enjoyed chatting with her and she made me feel like I could trust her with my hair.
The price is good for the location and everyone here is so nice. Itâ€™s super clean, marble floor, well-lit, and the location is just a few steps from all the major subways, which was so convenient. The environment was very inviting and I will send my friends to this place. If I could give this place a million stars I would. Iâ€™m so happy. You  have to check out this place and ask for Nadya. I wish everything was this easy in NYC!

originalText.text:
I have been going to Kee for over 10 years and I am extremely satisfied.  He is very adept at different hair styles and which ones work best.  Kee really cares about the quality of his work.  I would highly recommend him.

Kee recently moved from a different location. This new location is beyond clean and the staff is also very professional and courteous.  Must visit.

originalText.text: I am so happy about my haircut, I am coming back for sure. This place has outstanding hair professionals. Kee and Nadia are experienced and do a great job.
